title: Uhhhhh, excuse me?
body:
Clearly stated In** black and white**: 
_"September 28, 2018 at 01:00 a.m. AEST - November 20, 20, 2018 at 17:59 p.m. AEDT"_

So how come the championship chroma/borders aren't in the Hextech crafting shop anymore?
Last time I checked, October 26th was between September 28th and November 20th.

replies.body:
There's been some serious confusion around this one, but given the Tales from the Rift loot expires on November 3rd, the assumption would be that the other worlds loot will return then.

Why that is I don't know, maybe they can't display that much stuff in the panel? Maybe it's so people realise the new stuff is there and limited time? Maybe it's just a silly design choice?
